title: Reverse Legendaries and other ranked fails - Share your stories.
body:
After a fantastic run of 8 losses on my ranked smurf and being placed in bronze 3 (Main is now also con-currently trapped in gold - So i'm levelling the field and saying in no uncertain terms, I have contributed to those 8 losses) what nightmares have your encountered in ranked?

My faves today have been:

* Double reverse legendaries in games back to back, with a Trist (0/9/1) and Zyra (0/9/1) bot combo losing to a Lee Sin and Sivir Combo (remember this is in bronze) and a Vayne / Sona combo going 0/9/0 & 0/9/1 against a solo Annie bot.
* A Lee Sin smiting the minion rather then dragon and dying accordingly to dragon (despite explaining how that makes no sense)

*and the cream of the cake*

* A duo team going double mid (Veigar and Galio) going 1/7/1 and 0/3/1 then having to leave (at the 21 minute mark) because their mum said it was bed time.

If you place in bronze, don't try and fight your way into a better bracket, just resign to the fact you are going to die in there.

replies.body: wow I got placed in bronze made it out though now just hoping I don't get bronze again
No one cares, but for the sake of the argument, let's say your suffering and frustration has been due and noted. {{champion:48}}
You could just do well in your original provisionals. By that I mean the provisionals you do when you first play ranked. Not the provisionals you get at the beginning of each season.
